title: Obzor gas field
text: The Obzor gas field <a href="natural%20gas%20field">natural gas field</a> located on the continental shelf of the <a href="Black%20Sea">Black Sea</a>. It was discovered in 1993 and developed by <a href="PetroCeltic">PetroCeltic</a>. It will begin production in 2018 and produces <a href="natural%20gas">natural gas</a> and <a href="Natural%20gas%20condensate">condensates</a>. The total <a href="proven%20reserves">proven reserves</a> of the Obzor gas field are around 158 billion cubic feet (4.5 km³), and production is slated to be around 40 million cubic feet/day (1.1×106m³) in 2018.
